subject: Order #SSN4389
description_text:
Hi again,

Your service portal is not working as it should be.
I cant view my current ticket, you don't respond to my emails, a week has
passed and you have not answered me.

Answer my emails with more information about my order and corresponding
delivery date, otherwise just refund my money.

Best regards,
JC

conversations.body_text: Hi Jo√£o Cardoso,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Due to a high volume of recent emails, our customer service team may experience longer response times. We sincerely apologize for the poor experience this has caused you.  The pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund the additional shipping fees.

Hi,

Very well, I await the DHL tracking number then,
Thank you for the feedback,

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Best regards,
JC

service@simsonn.com
